member.summary: Inherit from it if you want to make a generic repo class

member.summary: Pass generic object to register its repo in the NoSql class

member.name: M:OxDistributedDb.Core.NoSql.GetAllCollectionNamesAsync
member.summary: Returns all collection names in the current db namespace

member.name: T:OxDistributedDb.Core.NoSqlGenericRepository`1
member.summary: Contains all the methods to be used for crud operations in mongo

member.name: M:OxDistributedDb.Core.NoSqlGenericRepository`1.GetQuerable(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{`0,System.Boolean}})
member.summary: Returns IQuerable object, but it is a not very effective way of gather data from mongodb database.

member.name: M:OxDistributedDb.Core.NoSqlGenericRepository`1.GetCollectionName(System.Type)
member.summary: This method uses our previously prepared attribute and gets documents collection by type of document provided in parameter (ex. when we pass Person as the parameter, this method will return “people” as a result).

member.name: M:OxDistributedDb.Core.NoSqlGenericRepository`1.FilterBy(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{`0,System.Boolean}})
member.summary: Those methods allows us to filter data by sending expressions in parameters. This works similar to LINQ, but operations are performed on database, so it’s much faster than doing it later in code-side.

member.name: M:OxDistributedDb.Core.NoSqlGenericRepository`1.FilterBy``1(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{`0,System.Boolean}},System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{`0,``0}})
member.summary: those methods allows us to filter data by sending expressions in parameters. This works similar to LINQ, but operations are performed on database, so it’s much faster than doing it later in code-side. Extra parameter called projectionExpression is useful, when you want to get only some fields, rather than full objects from filtered results.

member.name: M:OxDistributedDb.Core.NoSqlGenericRepository`1.FindOneAsync(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{`0,System.Boolean}})
member.summary: Similar to FirstOrDefault in LINQ, gets first value that matches an expression.

member.name: M:OxDistributedDb.Core.NoSqlGenericRepository`1.FindByIdAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Similar to FirstOrDefault in LINQ, gets first value that matches an expression.

member.name: M:OxDistributedDb.Core.NoSqlGenericRepository`1.InsertOneAsync(`0)
member.summary: That method simply inserts only one record to existing database.

member.name: M:OxDistributedDb.Core.NoSqlGenericRepository`1.InsertManyAsync(System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{`0})
member.summary: That method simply inserts collection of records to existing database.

member.name: M:OxDistributedDb.Core.NoSqlGenericRepository`1.ReplaceOneAsync(`0)
member.summary: That method simply replaces a record in existing database. Can be used insted.

member.name: M:OxDistributedDb.Core.NoSqlGenericRepository`1.DeleteOneAsync(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{`0,System.Boolean}})
member.summary: That method simply deletes one record from existing database.

member.name: M:OxDistributedDb.Core.NoSqlGenericRepository`1.DeleteByIdAsync(System.String)
member.summary: That method simply deletes one record by id in existing database.

member.name: M:OxDistributedDb.Core.NoSqlGenericRepository`1.DeleteManyAsync(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{`0,System.Boolean}})
member.summary: That method simply deletes collection of records in existing database.
